detailedDescription.articleBody: Nicolas Kim Coppola, known professionally as Nicolas Cage, is an American actor, director and producer. During his early career, Cage starred in a variety of films such as Valley Girl, Racing with the Moon, Birdy, Peggy Sue Got Married, Raising Arizona, Moonstruck, Vampire's Kiss, Wild at Heart, Fire Birds, Honeymoon in Vegas, and Red Rock West.
